name: Falling Egg (Joe Li)
description:
On the farm, poor Mr. Egg keeps dropping down. Try to save him from being broken. To do that you have to jump between different platforms and react quickly. Beware of the big rocks!

Controls :

A、D To move left and right

Information

This is the first game I made in Unity(I made it one year ago). It also has a mobile version on Google Play. All art and programming are made by myself. Sound Effects and Music are from IMSLP and Freesound.org. Unfortunately, I forget most of the exact resources and authors of them. 

Please let me know if there are any issues with the game.

Enjoy it!
